io.micronaut.http

Interface HttpResponse<B>

  • Type Parameters:
    B - The Http body type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeHolder, HttpMessage<B>, MutableAttributeHolder
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableHttpResponse<B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FullNettyClientHttpResponse, HttpResponseWrapper, NettyMutableHttpResponse

    public interface HttpResponse<B>
extends HttpMessage<B>

    Common interface for HTTP response implementations.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
